document.full_text: jarome iginla tallied his 1,000th career point to lift calgary to a 3-2 comeback victory over the st. louis blues on friday, keeping the flames alive in the playoffs hunt.
document.title: iginla's 1,000th point carries flames to important win
lines_and_colors: jarome iginla tallied his 1,000th career point to lift calgary to a 3-2 comeback victory over the st. louis blues on friday, keeping the flames alive in the playoffs hunt.
